ai.summary: Hannah's Meadow Walk is a 3.4 km easy, family-friendly stroll through tranquil UK meadows. The route features gentle, well-maintained paths and wide-open countryside scenery, making it suitable for beginners, children, and anyone seeking a relaxed outdoor experience.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat grass paths with occasional gentle undulations. Surfaces are typically firm but can be soft and muddy after rain; expect uneven patches and narrow gaps along hedgerows. Enjoy open meadow views, wildflowers, and occasional minor elevation changes.
ai.safety_notes: Check the forecast and wear sturdy, comfortable footwear. Follow marked paths and be prepared for mud after rain. Keep dogs on a leash where required and watch for livestock. Stay hydrated, protect yourself from the sun with sunscreen and a hat, and carry a basic first aid kit. If walking alone, tell someone your plans and estimated return time.
recommended_gear: Phone with charged battery and emergency contacts
ai.best_seasons: Spring and summer are ideal for flowers and longer daylight, but the walk can be done year-round with appropriate footwear and clothing.

seo.title: Hannah's Meadow Walk - Easy 3.4km Meadow Stroll in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Hannah's Meadow Walk, a gentle 3.4 km countryside stroll in the UK. Easy terrain, meadow scenery, practical safety tips, and gear recommendations.
